Package org.apache.juneau.rest

REST Server API

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RestChild
    Represents a simple child REST resource / path mapping.
    RestChildMatch
    Represents a matched Rest-annotated child on an HTTP request.
    RestChildren
    Implements the child resources of a Rest-annotated class.
    RestChildren.Builder
    Builder class.
    RestContext
    Defines the initial configuration of a RestServlet or @Rest annotated object.
    RestContext.Builder
    Builder class.
    RestContext.Builder.Void
    Represents a null value for the Rest.builder() annotation.
    RestContext.Void
    Represents a null value for the Rest.contextClass() annotation.
    RestOpContext
    Represents a single Java servlet/resource method annotated with @RestOp.
    RestOpContext.Builder
    Builder class.
    RestOpContext.Void
    Represents a null value for the RestOp.contextClass() annotation.
    RestOperations
    Encapsulates the set of RestOp-annotated methods within a single Rest-annotated object.
    RestOperations.Builder
    Builder class.
    RestOpInvoker
    A specialized invoker for methods that are called during a servlet request.
    RestOpSession
    A session for a single HTTP request.
    RestOpSession.Builder
    Builder class.
    RestRequest
    Represents an HTTP request for a REST resource.
    RestResponse
    Represents an HTTP response for a REST resource.
    RestSession
    Represents a single HTTP request.
    RestSession.Builder
    Builder class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HttpRuntimeException
    A RuntimeException meant to wrap a non-RuntimeException.
